name: High noon (itch) (buggit)
description:
You are wired man, intaker of drugs, and ready to save the day! With the use of adrenaline and nor-adrenaline syringes, you can stop the bomb from going off and destroying the city! But you only have one minute to do so because the bomb is set to go off at noon, so make sure to get high before then!

This project was made for the minute game jam with the theme wired, though there are multiple definitions for wired so I just chose the funniest one (:
